Description:
Detects potential tampering with Windows Defender settings such as adding exclusion using wmic

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Windows Defender Tampering Via Wmic.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%/namespace:\\\\root\\microsoft\\windows\\defender%' and (original_file_name = 'wmic.exe' and process_path like '%\wmic.exe'))
